meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with a deep stillness.
meanings.sent2: The stillness of the night was broken only by the chirping of crickets.
meanings.sent3: In the stillness of the library, you could hear a pin drop.
meanings.sent4: The stillness of the lake mirrored the calmness of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The stillness of the desert at noon was overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: She found stillness in the gentle sway of the trees.
meanings.sent2: The stillness of the garden brought a sense of peace to her heart.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at meditation was disrupted by the stillness of his stomach growling.
meanings.sent4: The stillness of the ocean at sunrise was like a soothing balm.
meanings.sent5: The stillness of the mountains at dusk was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: State of being quiet or peaceful.
meanings.sent1: The stillness of the room was interrupted by a sudden knock on the door.
meanings.sent2: She longed for the stillness of the countryside after a hectic day in the city.
meanings.sent3: The stillness of the cat before pouncing on its prey was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The stillness of the snow-covered landscape was like a scene from a painting.
meanings.sent5: The stillness of the morning mist enveloped the entire valley.
